class usb20_base_seq extends dv_base_seq #(
  .CFG_T       (usb20_agent_cfg),
  .SEQUENCER_T (usb20_sequencer)
);
  `uvm_object_utils(usb20_base_seq)

  `uvm_object_new

  virtual task body();
    `uvm_fatal(`gtn, "Need to override this when you extend from this class!")
  endtask

endclass
